snippet: LEAD: If a panel of Hollywood screenwriters - or law professors, for that matter - set out to create a case to test the premises of the current debate over death penalty appeals, they could hardly top the case of Robert Alton Harris....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: If a panel of Hollywood screenwriters - or law professors, for that matter - set out to create a case to test the premises of the current debate over death penalty appeals, they could hardly top the case of Robert Alton Harris.

headline.main: Washington Talk;   Execution Case Poses Classic Test for Court

byline.original: By LINDA GREENHOUSE, Special to The New York Times
